Ethereal.help: Ghosts can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.
Ethereal.targetHelp: Ghosts can make themselves Ethereal and shift out of the material plane. Ethereal Spectres are invisible, and cannot affect or be affected by those in normal space.

Resistance.help: Ghosts Spirits are resistant to Sleep, Fear and Immobilize
Resistance.shortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow
Resistance.targetHelp: Ghosts Spirits are resistant to Sleep, Fear and Immobilize
Resistance.targetShortHelp: Auto Res Sleep, Fear, Immobilize, Slow

Ghastly_Blast.help: Your Accuracy has been reduced by a Dark Blast.
Ghastly_Blast.targetHelp: Your Accuracy has been reduced by a Dark Blast.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

Necroplasmic_Grasp.help: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.
Necroplasmic_Grasp.targetHelp: The Ghost has enveloped you in it's Necroplasmic Grasp. You are Held as your life is drained.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage over time.

Fearsome_Stare.help: Instills tremendous Fear within a cone area in front of you, causing all affected targets to tremble in Terror uncontrollably. Recharge: Slow
Fearsome_Stare.targetHelp: The Fearsome Stare has terrified you and reduced your Accuracy.

Intimidate.help: You can threaten a single foe and cause him to helplessly tremble in Fear for a brief while. You must be at least level 14 and have Challenge or Provoke before selecting Intimidate.

Life_Drain.help: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your Accuracy is reduced.
Life_Drain.targetHelp: The Ghost has drained your life to heal herself. Your Accuracy is reduced.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Negative Energy damage.
